1:
Listen, sons, to a father's instruction,
\q and pay attention so you will know what understanding is.
\q
2:
I am giving you good instructions;
\q do not forsake my teaching.
3:
When I was a son of my father,
\q the tender and only child of my mother,
\q
6:
do not abandon wisdom and she will watch over you;
\q love her and she will keep you safe.
7:
Wisdom is the most important thing, so acquire wisdom
\q and spend all you own so you can get understanding.
\q
9:
She will put a wreath of honor on your head;
\q she will give you a beautiful crown."
10:
Listen, my son, and pay attention to my words,
\q and you will have many years in your life.
\q
12:
When you walk, no one will stand in your way
\q and if you run, you will not stumble.
14:
Do not follow the path of the wicked
\q and do not go along the way of those who do evil.
\q
15:
Avoid it, do not go on it;
\q turn away from it and go another way.
16:
For they cannot sleep until they do evil
\q and they are robbed of sleep until they cause someone to stumble.
\q
17:
For they eat the bread of wickedness
\q and drink the wine of violence.
19:
The way of the wicked is like darknessâ€”
\q they do not know what it is they stumble over.
21:
Do not let them turn away from your eyes;
\q keep them in your heart.
22:
For my words are life to those who find them
\q and health to their whole body.
\q
23:
Keep your heart safe and guard it with all diligence,
\q for from it flow the springs of life.
24:
Put crooked speech away from you
\q and put corrupt talk far from you.
\q
25:
Let your eyes look straight ahead
\q and fix your gaze straight before you.
27:
Do not turn aside to the right or to the left;
\q turn your foot away from evil.
